title: Nursing Pharmacology Multimodal Case Study Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of pharmacology and nursing
context.additional_context: Case-based project implementation in a blended learning environment using digital devices, considering cognitive load theory

learning_goals: Learners can explain pharmacological properties and clinical applications of specific drugs through the case study video production process
Learners can analyze and present key considerations for medication administration in nursing scenarios via peer feedback
Learners can create multimodal content that visually represents pharmacological knowledge using digital tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
